channel.title: A question about cloud file management
channel.description:
I haven’t known that you could sort your iCloud samples into folders until recently..
I want to sort all of them into folders now. But im worried that it’s going to affect any drum kits that are already using the samples. I have a lot of unfinished projects with lots of samples, it would be a pain to have to re-find all the samples because they are in a different location.
Does sorting samples into different folders affect the drum kits?

item.title: A question about cloud file management
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yes, most definitely. You can also only go one sub folder down from the Samples folder.

Read full topic
item.source: A question about cloud file management
